plugins.name: Button State Builder
plugins.description:
Button State Builder helps you create all interactive states (hover, pressed, disabled, & focused) from a single base button. Style your base button (colors, fonts, icons) however you like — then run the plugin to automatically generate polished, accessible states.


To properly run the plugin, the button layout must include a state layer that accepts interactive color states. We recommend starting from a base button provided in the playground file.
plugins.tagline: Build perfect button states, effortlessly

135693.name: Button State Builder
135693.description:
Button State Builder helps you create all interactive states (hover, pressed, disabled, & focused) from a single base button. Style your base button (colors, fonts, icons) however you like — then run the plugin to automatically generate polished, accessible states.


To properly run the plugin, the button layout must include a state layer that accepts interactive color states. We recommend starting from a base button provided in the playground file.

plugins.name: Lazer
plugins.description:
Lazer is a plugin for Figma that provides quick commands to adjust the layout and appearance properties of selected elements. It is somewhat opinionated.


The idea is to leave the keyboard less by creating pseudo shortcuts. By bringing up the Actions input with command + K or command + / and then typing a short code (eg. w.h), the fuzzy search will bring your focus to an action you can execute by pressing enter.


I used Gemini 2.5 Pro to build this.


Features

This plugin allows you to quickly adjust:


Width & Height

w.h - Set Width to Hug

h.h - Set Height to Hug

w.f - Set Width to Fill

h.f - Set Height to Fill

w.. - Set Width (prompts for custom value)

h.. - Set Height (prompts for custom value)


Padding

p.0 - Set All Padding to 0

p.16 - Set All Padding to 16

p.. - Set Padding (prompts for custom value)


Auto Layout

al.. - Set Auto Layout Alignment (opens alignment UI)

al.h - Set Auto Layout to Horizontal

al.v - Set Auto Layout to Vertical

g.0 - Set Gap to 0

g.8 - Set Gap to 8

g.16 - Set Gap to 16

g.. - Set Gap (prompts for custom value)


Border Radius

br.0 - Set Border Radius to 0px

br.8 - Set Border Radius to 8px

br.. - Set Border Radius (prompts for custom value)


Stroke

s.0 - Set Stroke Width to 0

s.1 - Set Stroke Width to 1

sw.. - Set Stroke Width (prompts for custom value)

sc.. - Set Stroke Colour (prompts for custom value)


Fill

f.1 - Add White Fill

f.0 - Remove All Fills

f.. - Set Fill Colour (prompts for custom value)


Text

ls.. - Set Text Letter Spacing (prompts for custom value)

t.s - Set Text Size (prompts for custom value)


General

help! - Show Commands and Shortcuts (displays this list in a popup)


Usage

  1. Open the Actions input with command + K or command + /
  2. Type the short code for the command (eg. w.h)
  3. Press enter (assuming you have your desired command in focus)


* Many commands apply adjustments directly (e.g., w.h - Set Width to Hug).

* The al.. - Set Auto Layout Alignment command will open a dialog for visual alignment selection.

* Commands ending with .. (e.g., p.. - Set Padding) will prompt you to enter a custom value.
plugins.tagline: Shortcuts as quick actions to help you Figma faster

plugins.name: JSON to Variable
plugins.description:
You can import a JSON file to create grouped Figma variables. you can download the pre-structured Tailwind color palette JSON file via the link as a starting point:


Tailwind colors structured.json


The following is an example of a correctly formatted JSON:

[
{
"CollectionName": {
"modes": {
"ModeName": {
"GroupName": {
"Primary": {
"$value": "#FFFFFF",
"$type": "color"
},

"secondary": {
"$value": "#F5F5F5",
"$type": "color"
}
},
"GroupName2": {
"primary": {
"$value": "#2196F3",
"$type": "color"
}
}
}
}
}
}
]
plugins.tagline: Import JSON file to variable

plugins.name: Bangalicon
plugins.description:
🔥 Bangalicon - The First Icon Plugin You Will Ever Need For Figma


Now, with a new Plugin of Bangalicon, you can get more than 500 high-quality SVG icons right in your Figma workflow. Bangalicons' curated collection of beautifully crafted icons spanning interfaces, communication, business, media, and more is at your fingertips now. It has been meticulously designed for speed, flexibility, and pixel perfection.


✨ Key Features:


500+ icons: Scalable and diverse as per the requirement.


Live Preview & Insert: You can browse, search, and without leaving Figma, icons can be inserted seamlessly which saves time.


Category-based filtering: Finding what you want is made easier because of organized categories.


Will Bangalicon work on IOS apps? Yes. Whether it is website designing or mobile marketing visuals, Bangalicon for Figma is guaranteed to raise your level of design visually in an instant.


⚡️ Save time and design better with Bangalicon.
plugins.tagline: The world of most creative icons

Now, with a new Plugin of Bangalicon, you can get more than 500 high-quality SVG icons right in your Figma workflow. 139238.release_notes:

plugins.name: Email Name Generator
plugins.description:
Easily generate realistic and culturally diverse names right inside Figma. NameGen Africa helps designers and developers populate mockups with random African and global names—perfect for UI/UX projects, user flows, and form demos.


Features:


Generate random names with authentic African and international options

Choose between first name only or first and last name (separated by a period: john.doe)

Select email type: corporate (e.g., john.doe@company.com) or personal (e.g., john.doe@gmail.com)


Instantly fill text fields or use in prototyping workflows


Perfect for creating inclusive and realistic user data with just a few clicks!

plugins.name: Ethos
plugins.description:
Ethos offers a top-notch brand asset management software solution and tools to streamline and organize your digital assets effortlessly.

- Create and share your own custom brand showrooms as an interactive website and pdf, and showcase and maintain your branding best practices.

- Share your official brand copy, brand logos, brand colors, brand fonts, brand rules and custom brand sections.

- Deploy your brand voice and image correctly to activate your powerful brand position.

- Improve your existing brand copy to bring it to the next level with artificial intelligence.

- Make your brand more authentic and cohesive by generating expanded primary, secondary and monotone color palettes.

- Invite your team and clients to your official brand spaces, and enable collaboration on one or more brands at a time.


For any questions or feedback, feel free to ping us at team@yourethos.io

plugins.name: Random Rectangle Maker
plugins.description:
This plugin was made for testing purposes to test the cursor AI. I used Cursor AI to write the code and ChatGPT to help design the cover and icon. It’s a quick example of how fun and fast building with AI tools can be.


With one click, the plugin adds a rectangle to your canvas. Each rectangle shows up in a random spot with a random bright color.


→ Made with the help of Cursor AI for coding

→ Visuals created with ChatGPT

→ Quick, simple, and fun to use

→ A small tool for creative ideas


I really enjoy working where design and code come together. If you’re building something creative like a design tool, plugin, or even a storytelling project, I’d love to connect.

Or connect on LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/heyabdulwahab/

plugins.name: ComponentFiller AI
plugins.description:
ComponentFiller は生成AIを用いて、選択したフレームの原稿と、人間が用意したコンポーネントのコードを組み合わせ、コンポーネントに適切な原稿を入力したコードを返します（要APIキー／Gemini のAPIは無料で取得できます）


利用方法

  1. 利用するAIのAPIを選択
  2. APIキーを入力
  3. 利用する言語と、言語に合わせた基本のプロンプトを設定（任意）
  4. ベースとなるコンポーネントのコードを入力
  5. 利用したいフレームを選択
  6. コードを生成


注意事項：コードを生成するために、選択したAIサービスにデータが送信されます


---


ComponentFiller uses generation AI to combine the script for the selected frame with the component code prepared by humans, and returns a code with the appropriate script entered into the component (API key required).


How to use

  1. Select the AI ​​API to use
  2. Enter the API key
  3. Set the language to use and the basic prompt for the language (optional)
  4. Enter the base component code
  5. Select the frame you want to use
  6. Generate code


Please note: Your data will be sent to the AI ​​service of your choice to generate the code.
plugins.tagline: Insert the text from the design data into your code

plugins.name: QQT Random Number Generator
plugins.description:
This is a Figma plugin that replaces selected text with randomly generated numbers. It supports both Chinese and English language interfaces, has a clear visual hierarchy, and is simple and intuitive to operate.

Functional Features

1. Range Setting: You can set the minimum and maximum values of the random numbers (e.g., 20 - 50).

2. Decimal Place Setting: You can set the number of digits after the decimal point.

3. Thousand Separator Display: You can choose whether to insert a thousand separator in the number.

4. Custom Prefix and Suffix: You can add custom prefixes and suffixes, such as +, -, %, HKD, ¥, etc.

5. Chinese - English Switch: It supports quick switching between Chinese and English interfaces.


这是一个Figma插件，用于将选中的文本替换为随机生成的数字。支持中英文双语界面，视觉层次分明，操作简单直观。

功能特点

1. 区间设定：可以设置随机数字的最小值和最大值（例如20～50）

2. 小数位设置：可以设置小数点后的位数

3. 千分位显示：可以选择是否在数字中插入千分位分隔符

4. 自定义前后缀：可以添加自定义前缀和后缀，如+、-、%、HKD、¥等

5. 中英文切换：支持中英文界面快速切换
plugins.tagline: This is a Figma plugin that replaces selected text with randomly generated numbers.

plugins.name: Long side scaling
plugins.description:
Tired of manually resizing images within frames one by one, especially when you need them to fit a specific maximum dimension while keeping their aspect ratio? "Long Side Scaling" automates this task!


What this plugin does:

  1. It finds the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill inside each selected Frame.
  2. It takes the dimension you provide (e.g., 1040px).
  3. It identifies whether the image's width or height is larger (the "longest side").
  4. It then proportionally resizes the image so that its longest side exactly matches the dimension you entered.


How to use:

  1. Select one or more Frames containing the images you want to resize.
  2. Run the "Long Side Scaling" plugin from the Plugins menu.
  3. The plugin window will show how many selected frames contain a suitable image.
  4. Enter the desired dimension (in pixels) for the longest side into the input field.
  5. Click the "Start" button.
  6. The images within the selected frames will be resized instantly!


Key Benefits:

  1. Batch Processing: Saves time by resizing images in multiple frames at once.
  2. Proportional Scaling: Guarantees your images won't be stretched or distorted.
  3. Consistent Sizing: Perfect for creating uniform image galleries, grids, or ensuring images don't exceed a maximum width or height.
  4. Simple Interface: Easy to use with just one input and one button.


Important Note:

This plugin specifically targets the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill it finds directly within each selected Frame. Images inside groups within the frame, or images applied as fills to shapes other than Rectangles, will not be affected.
plugins.tagline: Scale images proportionally by their longest side.

130386.name: Long side scaling
130386.description:
Tired of manually resizing images within frames one by one, especially when you need them to fit a specific maximum dimension while keeping their aspect ratio? "Long Side Scaling" automates this task!


What this plugin does:

  1. It finds the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill inside each selected Frame.
  2. It takes the dimension you provide (e.g., 1040px).
  3. It identifies whether the image's width or height is larger (the "longest side").
  4. It then proportionally resizes the image so that its longest side exactly matches the dimension you entered.


How to use:

  1. Select one or more Frames containing the images you want to resize.
  2. Run the "Long Side Scaling" plugin from the Plugins menu.
  3. The plugin window will show how many selected frames contain a suitable image.
  4. Enter the desired dimension (in pixels) for the longest side into the input field.
  5. Click the "Start" button.
  6. The images within the selected frames will be resized instantly!


Key Benefits:

  1. Batch Processing: Saves time by resizing images in multiple frames at once.
  2. Proportional Scaling: Guarantees your images won't be stretched or distorted.
  3. Consistent Sizing: Perfect for creating uniform image galleries, grids, or ensuring images don't exceed a maximum width or height.
  4. Simple Interface: Easy to use with just one input and one button.


Important Note:

This plugin specifically targets the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill it finds directly within each selected Frame. Images inside groups within the frame, or images applied as fills to shapes other than Rectangles, will not be affected.
130386.tagline: Scale images proportionally by their longest side.

plugins.name: FigJam Sticky Color Picker
plugins.description:
This is a plugin for setting the color of Sticky:

  1. Directly set the fill color of the Sticky.
  2. It is also able to set the color of the text within the Sticky.
  3. You can set the color for a single Sticky node, or for multiple selected Sticky nodes. Even more, you can directly select an area, and the plugin will automatically identify the Sticky nodes within the selected area and change their colors as well as the colors of the text.
plugins.tagline: Custom the color of sticky and sticky text

plugins.name: LARA for Figma
plugins.description:
LARA is the flagship product of Lithero, the first AI company to design and build products specifically for pharma marketing teams. LARA is a custom-made AI that learns the nuances of pharma brands at lightspeed, supporting brand teams throughout the end-to-end content creation process.


The official LARA for Figma plugin brings the power of LARA Screen and LARA Claims to your workspace. Get actionable feedback on the compliance of your content at the point of creation, saving significant time downstream. LARA for Figma complements the content creation process by ensuring high quality and accuracy of created content. Shorten review cycles, reduce spend, and get the most out of Figma with LARA!


Key Features:

Claims

- Detect differences between created content and approved claims, enabling corrections before MLR

- Trace claims back to their references and associated safety text in LARA Claims for additional context


Safety Text

- Identify and insert any required safety text missing from the content

- Generate accurate & complete safety text blocks to insert into content


References

- Find potential approved references that could be used to substantiate claims

- Locate any claims that are missing citations to typically seen references


*Requires subscription to LARA Claims and Screen. For more information, visit https://www.lithero.com/
plugins.tagline: Bring the power of LARA to your process

plugins.name: Not a Linker
plugins.description:
[Ru]

Not a Linker — это умный плагин для быстрого копирования ссылок на фреймы и секции в Figma с поддержкой кликабельных ссылок.


🎯 КЛЮЧЕВЫЕ ВОЗМОЖНОСТИ:

  1. Умное копирование — HTML + обычный текст для максимальной совместимости
  2. Кликабельные ссылки — работают в Telegram, Slack и других приложениях
  3. 9 языков — автоматическое определение языка браузера
  4. Мгновенная работа — выбрал фреймы → один клик → готово
  5. Универсальность — работает с фреймами и секциями
  6. Компактный интерфейс — не отвлекает от работы


🚀 КАК РАБОТАЕТ:

  1. Выберите фреймы или секции
  2. Запустите плагин → "Copy and Close"
  3. Вставляйте кликабельные ссылки где угодно


📋 ФОРМАТ ВЫВОДА:

Название фрейма
https://www.figma.com/file/...
--
Другой фрейм
https://www.figma.com/file/...


🌍 ЯЗЫКИ: English, Русский, Deutsch, Français, Español, Português, 日本語, 한국어, 中文

📱 СОВМЕСТИМОСТЬ: Telegram, Slack, Notes, Word, Notion, Confluence и любые текстовые редакторы


Идеально для дизайнеров, которые часто делятся ссылками на конкретные фреймы. Экономьте время и работайте эффективнее!


[En]

Not a Linker is a smart plugin for quickly copying frame and section links in Figma with clickable link support.


🎯 KEY FEATURES:

  1. Smart copying — HTML + plain text for maximum compatibility
  2. Clickable links — work in Telegram, Slack, and other apps
  3. 9 languages — automatic browser language detection
  4. Instant workflow — select frames → one click → done
  5. Universal — works with both frames and sections
  6. Compact interface — doesn't distract from your work


🚀 HOW IT WORKS:

  1. Select frames or sections
  2. Run plugin → "Copy and Close"
  3. Paste clickable links anywhere


📋 OUTPUT FORMAT:

Frame Name
https://www.figma.com/file/...
--
Another Frame
https://www.figma.com/file/...


🌍 LANGUAGES: English, Русский, Deutsch, Français, Español, Português, 日本語, 한국어, 中文

📱 COMPATIBILITY: Telegram, Slack, Notes, Word, Notion, Confluence, and any text editors


Perfect for designers who frequently share links to specific frames. Save time and work more efficiently!
plugins.tagline: Quickly copy frame and section links with automatic multilingual support

plugins.description:
Tailwind Token Builder helps you generate clean, consistent Tailwind CSS tokens from your Figma designs using variables and naming conventions that match your codebase.


✅ Syncs with your design system

✅ Exports tokens in JSON format

✅ Built for Tailwind and design/dev collaboration


How to use it:

1.Select a frame or style set

2.Choose your token group (e.g. color, spacing, radius)

3.Generate a Tailwind-compatible JSON file in one click


This plugin is perfect for teams who want to bridge design and code with ease—no manual mapping, no guesswork.
plugins.tagline: Build Tailwind-compatible design tokens directly in Figma

plugins.name: Figma Slide Animation
plugins.description:
Figma Slide Animation Plugin

A Figma plugin that creates continuous animation transitions between selected frames.


Features

  1. Creates one continuous animation transition between selected frames
  2. Overwrites existing transitions between frames
  3. Ignores non-frame objects (Groups, etc.)
  4. Supports both vertical-first and horizontal-first transition priorities
  5. Dark mode and light mode support


Animation Settings

Trigger : Next Page (→, ↓, Enter), Previous Page (←, ↑)
Action : Navigate to
Animation: Smart Animate
Curve : Ease In and Out
Duration : 300ms



Usage in Figma

  1. Select 2 or more frames in Figma
  2. Select direction priority (Vertical or Horizontal)
  3. Click "Create Animation" button


Support & Feedback

Your feedback is invaluable in making the Figma Slide Animation even better. If you have suggestions, or if you encounter any issues, please reach out to me:

  1. X: @chnotchy

Stay tuned for more updates and improvements!



Changelog


v1.1.0 2025/06/28

  1. Improved plugin performance


v1.0.0 2025/06/26

  1. Initial release
plugins.tagline: A Figma plugin that creates continuous animation transitions between selected frames.

plugins.name: Screen Count
plugins.description:
Screen Count updates the numbers on your screen labels based on position (top to bottom, left to right). Just add the name of the label container, select the flow or frame you want to update, and hit "Renumber".


You can now use letters instead of numbers or choose to append to the existing text rather than replace it.
plugins.tagline: Updated screen numbering for flows in a couple clicks

plugins.name: Corner Radius Balancer
plugins.description:
Corner Radius Balancer

Tired of manually calculating corner radius for nested elements in Auto Layout? 😩

This plugin helps you automatically balance the corner radius relationship between a parent frame and its child element, based on the simple formula: Parent Radius = Child Radius + Padding.


How it Works

The plugin simplifies your workflow by linking the three key values. When you adjust one, the others intelligently update:

Adjust Parent Radius

Padding remains fixed, and Child Radius updates automatically.

Adjust Padding

Parent Radius remains fixed, and Child Radius updates automatically.

Adjust Child Radius

Padding remains fixed, and Parent Radius updates automatically.


Key Features

Quick Fix Button ⚡

Instantly corrects the corner radius relationship with a single click.

Real-time Preview

See your changes on the canvas as you make them in the plugin.

Sync with Figma UI

Changes made directly in Figma's properties panel are reflected in the plugin.

Supports Various Corner Patterns

Works with uniform, partial, and custom corner radii by preserving the differences between them.


How to Use 📝

Select a Parent Frame

Choose a parent frame that uses Auto Layout and contains a child rectangle.

Adjust Values

Use the sliders or input fields in the plugin to adjust the values.

Complete

Click "Done" when finished.
plugins.tagline: Automatically adjust nested corner radius values.

139566.description:

This plugin helps you automatically balance the corner radius relationship between a parent frame and its child element, based on the simple formula: Parent Radius = Child Radius + Padding.


How it Works

Adjust Child Radius

plugins.name: Token Exporter Pro
plugins.description:
Export Figma color, gradient, and shadow tokens with one click — no fluff, just clean, dev-ready output.


Choose your naming convention (camelCase, PascalCase, dot.notation…), match your framework (React, Tailwind, or plain CSS), and get tokens you can actually use.


Includes:

✅ Linear & radial gradients (with angles)

✅ Shadow exports (drop & inner)

✅ Format-ready for Tailwind, JSON, and SCSS

✅ Works great with Style Dictionary or custom configs


Perfect for design system handoffs, developer styling, and anyone who’s tired of manually formatting hex codes.
plugins.tagline: Export design tokens from Figma — with naming styles, framework formats, gradients & shadows.

138641.name: Token Exporter Pro
138641.description:
Export Figma color, gradient, and shadow tokens with one click — no fluff, just clean, dev-ready output.


Choose your naming convention (camelCase, PascalCase, dot.notation…), match your framework (React, Tailwind, or plain CSS), and get tokens you can actually use.


Includes:

✅ Linear & radial gradients (with angles)

✅ Shadow exports (drop & inner)

✅ Format-ready for Tailwind, JSON, and SCSS

✅ Works great with Style Dictionary or custom configs


Perfect for design system handoffs, developer styling, and anyone who’s tired of manually formatting hex codes.
138641.release_notes: Added "documentAccess": "read" to support newer Figma permissions
138641.tagline: Export design tokens from Figma — with naming styles, framework formats, gradients & shadows.

plugins.name: Invoicely
plugins.description:
Create clean, professional invoices directly inside Figma — no extra tools needed.


Invoicely lets freelancers, designers, and agencies generate stylish invoices in seconds with pre-built templates, client autofill.


✦ Select a template

✦ Add your client and items

✦ Hit “Generate Invoice” — done.


Built for speed. Designed for simplicity.

accepted.name: Diego Grillo
accepted.description:
I like building things that people use.
Mostly simple, useful, sometimes weird.
Currently shipping plugins, tools & ideas.

plugins.tagline: Quick Invoice Maker for Figma

137998.name: Invoicely
137998.description:
Create clean, professional invoices directly inside Figma — no extra tools needed.


Invoicely lets freelancers, designers, and agencies generate stylish invoices in seconds with pre-built templates, client autofill.


✦ Select a template

✦ Add your client and items

✦ Hit “Generate Invoice” — done.


Built for speed. Designed for simplicity.
137998.release_notes:
This is the first public release of Invoicely.

✔️ All core features are working:

Template selection

Client & sender input

Tax customization

Instant invoice generation

Fully editable directly in Figma

⚠️ Minor note:
Some alignments in the invoice template aren’t pixel-perfect yet.
We wanted to ship early and improve fast — updates are already planned to polish everything.

Stay tuned for more features and improvements coming soon!

plugins.name: Variables To Css
plugins.description:
Includes:

  1. Select specific collections
  2. Choose if a variable should be linked to another css variable.
  3. Choose a prefix
  4. Choose if values should be recalculated to REM.


Modes will be placed in separated "data-themes" which can be easily switched within html.
plugins.tagline: Export Figma variables to CSS variables with data-themes and linked css variables.

137945.name: Variables To Css

  3. Choose a prefix
  4. Choose if values should be recalculated to REM.


Modes will be placed in separated "data-themes" which can be easily switched within html.
137945.release_notes:
- Copy css button
- Fix data-theme spelling
- Added option for first mode is default.
- UI fixes
137945.tagline: Export Figma variables to CSS variables with data-themes and linked css variables.

plugins.name: Thumbly
plugins.description:
Thumbly — Instant Project Thumbnails

Create beautiful project thumbnails — fast and professional. This plugin helps you generate stunning thumbnail covers for your projects, presentations, and portfolio content directly in Figma.


No need to design covers from scratch. Just enter your title, description, pick an emoji, choose a theme — and Thumbly generates a ready-to-use thumbnail frame in seconds.


Key features:

  1. Instant thumbnail generation with custom text
  2. 100+ project-themed emojis to choose from
  3. Light and dark theme presets
  4. Optimized 1920×960px cover size
  5. Built-in Auto Layout for precise structure

accepted.name: Pavel Grachev
accepted.description: Product designer. Focused on clarity, usability, and quality design systems.

plugins.tagline: Effortless thumbnail design for every project.
